text: Bodhananda (1883–1928) was an Indian Hindu philosopher. He was the disciple and the nominated successor of his guru, called Narayana Guru, though both died only days apart. ==References== ==External links== *Narayanagurukulam Category:1883 births Category:1928 deaths Category:20th-century Indian philosophers Category:Hindu philosophers Category:Indian Hindu religious leaders Category:Narayana Guru Category:20th-century Hindu religious leaders
title: Bodhananda
